title: India Helicopter Crash Flight Data Recorder Is Recovered
sub_head: Investigation proceeds into crash that killed the country’s highest-ranking military official, his wife and 11 military personnel
body:
NEW DELHI—Authorities investigating the cause of the helicopter crash that killed India’s highest-ranking military official have recovered the flight data recorder, a senior security official said.
The country’s chief of defense staff, Bipin Rawat, was killed along with his wife and 11 military personnel when the helicopter they were traveling in crashed in the southern state of Tamil Nadu on Wednesday.
